评论详情: This bag is perfect for my middle school daughter when she goes to co-op.
Kiddo used for school. Didn't make it 4 months before breaking, but was cute. They also said the water bottle spot was too little.
can hold several books without breaking, good quality for a low price

its a really good bag!!  I believe it also came with this yummy smelly thing which just gave it and even better vibe  they seemed to have put some work into it and possibly pride themselves on giving a good customer experience and I did get just that!  Its not too big or too small but a perfect size!
I’ve had it since September 4th, and it broke nov 6th. It held up well. but is not really suited for school. also got dirty quickly. straps aren't very comfortable on skin.
Zipper broke on second day of use. Very disappointing
I put all my pins on it and stuff and it’s the cutest bag I’ve had yet! Didn’t take too long to get here too
It works well and has a ton of space in each compartment! It does seem like its easy to stain and get dirty so be wary.
Its to be expected. Its also really thin but the zips n stuff works fine so get it if u dont care too much about quality.

It looks a lot bigger in the picture. The side pockets are not nearly big enough for a water bottle, it feels a bit cheaply made. However it is a nice bag, the door is nice (I got red) and it functions nicely as an everyday bag if you're not using it for school or work, if you need a bag that fits a laptop this is not it!!!
Size is great for high school. Lots of pockets. Comfortable to wear on side or crossbody.
SOSOSOSOSOS CUTE I LOVE IT SM OMGGGGG :3

When I saw this bag I thought it was a Jean like material but it is not it is more of a cloth.this bag is one of my favorites because it is very comfortable on my shoulders and it is very portable and has lots of space.Definitely worth the $18.99.I highly recommend buying this bag

The bag is adorable. It doesn't have too many pockets and is the perfect size and style, however, the patches seem to be hot glued on instead of stitched. Was hoping to remove the patches to put on my own, but the glue is impossible to get out of the fabric. Bag is cute, but I'm disappointed that I'm not able to customize it the way I want to.
Le encantó a mi hija
This bag is small and great for carrying around to school for my teen. It’s lasted a while and hasn’t ripped even after washing it. The cute design fits their kawaii style well.
I love how cute it is and plenty of space.  I like that it came with pins to decorate it yourself.

评论概述: Great alternative to a school binder
评论详情: Purchased for my daughter after her binder became unusable. So far, she is very satisfied with the bag - it looks great and fits all the school items including laptop.

little sister told me it made everyone in school jealous and everyone was complimenting her. she felt like the coolest kid in school.  Best thank you, without actually saying thank you, I ever got.  So it's not just a bag. Every1 thought its stylish too.

This bag is one of the cutest bags ever! I really like the colors and the Y2K kawaii elements that this bag has on it. It's able to fit my laptop, books, chargers, water bottle and a few snacks to take with me to campus. This is a perfect college/uni bag for bringing around all of your essentials without having it to heavy. Also, it's a crossbody bag which helps in distributing the weight evenly and not making it seem like the bag is too heavy at all.

This is not the strongest bag, but it has a fair amount of room and is perfect for a kawaii loving girl! This purse is one of my daughter's favorites, it holds just enough items, but I have to remind her to be careful as the bag is a little flimsy. The side pouches will not hold much and there is potential any items in them will fall out. The main compartment can hold a couple larger items like a phone or wallet. The patches seem to be on pretty good and haven't fallen off. The purse overall is very cute and practical, it's definitely a giftable item.

This bag is cute and fairly spacious. It can accommodate your everyday items, notebooks, books and similar material. You can fit a tablet in there, but it too small to fit a laptop that is over 13 inches. The material is nice, but the shoulder strap seems a bit on the flimsy side. In the overall, it does give the impression of not being that sturdy, and I would definitely not overstuff as I have the feeling that it may break. The design is simple and comes with a little plush cat keychain. It has a couple of compartments inside and three outside pockets. Good for lightweight use.
It's a nice, small bag. Very little but lightweight. Has pockets on the front which are nice. Has a good shoulder strap. Zipper works well. It's very cute.

评论概述: Very cute, but better-sized for tweens/teens than adult women
评论详情: I was looking for a small messenger bag that I could use as an under-seat carryon for airplane trips. The size of this bag and the number of pockets seemed perfect. Plus the bag is very cute and I love the color.  Unfortunately, the whole thing is just tiny. It feels more like someone took a nice messenger bag and shark it down to toy size and child’s quality. The pockets would be of no use to me on an airplane; the belting used to close the pockets are so loose that everything would likely slide out when placed under the seat. The water bottle carrier is too small for a standard (narrow) water bottle.  I do like the bag and will be passing it on to a young person in my life. Sadly though, this is not a useful bag for an adult woman.

This bag right here is certified cute! If your daughter is into Kawaii, you will get MAJOR BROWNIE POINTS lol. This bag is not only cute but very durable and has tons of space. The design and quality, are top notch! The bag doesn't feel cheap or flimsy and the color is spot on with what you see in the picture. Overall this bag gets a 10/10.

There’s not really much space in this bag. It fits a 10.9 inch ipad, a planner, a pencil case, and maybe a very small water bottle could squeeze. The material feels pretty water resistant which is nice. It feels durable enough, but I’m  not sure how long it will last. It’s really cute though and did come with the charm.
Overall the bag is pretty good, comes exactly as shown and is a good size, just has a bit of an annoying texture but that not a bad issue.

I got this for my granddaughter who loves the cuteness and charming styles of Kawaii.  The messenger bag is well made with nylon material on the outside and a waterproof material lining the inside of the bag.  It is very light weight with a nice shoulder strap that can be used as a crossbody bag or shoulder bag.  It has 2 zippers that work perfectly and several pockets both inside and outside that can used for a multitude of things.  A cute little doll is included with the bag and can be used to hook onto the bag or wherever you choose.  This is the perfect bag for a preteen or teen girl due it's light weight and size.

I had higher expectations for this bag, but it's just not for me. Maybe it would be for a middle school aged kid, but for an adult the quality of the pockets isn't good and it just looks poor in quality. It doesn't fit everything I need like I thought it would either.
My daughter wanted this bag to complete her grunge outfits. It is a very nice bag. It can fit a laptop and notebooks very easily. It is not to large and she can carry it discreetly.

This messenger bag style is very simple and basic. The material is a cross between Nylon and Canvas. I felt like the Canvas material strap could have easily been swapped for the Nylon consistency. The bag looks well made until you see the canvas style strap. The strap however is adjustable. There are some organization and I did get the cat keychain with the bag. The bag arrived in a plastic Ziplock style and when you take it out the strap is inside the bag. on the one side with the bag was the included Cat charm that is in the photos.  Why I rated this as a 4 star, Although, the bag looks and feels durable. The Strap is a different material and made me think of lower quality. The bag is spacious enough where it can work for Adults/Teens and kids who want a messenger bag style. It can hold a light Everyday Carry Kit. I've had concerns about the strap breaking if packed heavy and it's something I don't want to risk. This bag is not ITA ("It Hurts!") Pin/merch bag. I wouldn't risk trying to set this bag as a decorative piece to show off your fandom to a character or series. But, it will work for basic everyday carry. Like your phone, charger, wallet, keys, etc.
This fit a lot more than I thought it would. The color is nice and the material is great as well. The strap is also adjustable.

评论概述: I love the bag, but it didn't come with the keychain
评论详情: This bag is super cute. I love it. It's roomy and has tons of pockets. It's a wonderful purse. However, the little kitty keychain was not included, sadly. It's no big deal since I just threw on a Rilakkuma keychain I had laying around, but do keep this in mind if your main reason for buying this bag is the little kitty :(
I love it!
Picture looks good, but the actual bag is way cheap.  The sewing line need to be fixed by yourself and the structure od the bag is not about this price tag.
